verses.text: \w The|strong="H8010"\w* \w Song|strong="H7892"\w* \w of|strong="H7892"\w* \w songs|strong="H7892"\w*, which \w is|strong="H8010"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w*’s.

Let \w him|strong="H2896"\w* \w kiss|strong="H5401"\w* \w me|strong="H3588"\w* \w with|strong="H6310"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w kisses|strong="H5390"\w* \w of|strong="H6310"\w* \w his|strong="H3588"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* thy \w love|strong="H1730"\w* \w is|strong="H2896"\w* \w better|strong="H2896"\w* \w than|strong="H2896"\w* \w wine|strong="H3196"\w*.

Thine \w ointments|strong="H8081"\w* \w have|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w goodly|strong="H2896"\w* \w fragrance|strong="H7381"\w*; \w thy|strong="H5921"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w is|strong="H8034"\w* \add as \add*\w ointment|strong="H8081"\w* \w poured|strong="H8081"\w* \w forth|strong="H7324"\w*; \w therefore|strong="H3651"\w* do \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w virgins|strong="H5959"\w* love \w thee|strong="H2896"\w*.

\w Draw|strong="H4900"\w* \w me|strong="H4900"\w*; \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w run|strong="H7323"\w* after thee: \w the|strong="H2142"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w hath|strong="H4428"\w* \w brought|strong="H7323"\w* \w me|strong="H4900"\w* into \w his|strong="H2142"\w* \w chambers|strong="H2315"\w*: \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w be|strong="H4428"\w* \w glad|strong="H8055"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w rejoice|strong="H8055"\w* \w in|strong="H4428"\w* thee, \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w make|strong="H8055"\w* \w mention|strong="H2142"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w thy|strong="H2142"\w* \w love|strong="H1730"\w* more \w than|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w wine|strong="H3196"\w*: \w rightly|strong="H4339"\w* do \w they|strong="H7323"\w* \w love|strong="H1730"\w* thee.

I am \w black|strong="H7838"\w*, \w but|strong="H7838"\w* \w comely|strong="H5000"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* ye \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* \w of|strong="H1323"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, \w as|strong="H3389"\w* \w the|strong="H8010"\w* tents \w of|strong="H1323"\w* \w Kedar|strong="H6938"\w*, \w as|strong="H3389"\w* \w the|strong="H8010"\w* \w curtains|strong="H3407"\w* \w of|strong="H1323"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w*.

\w Look|strong="H7200"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w upon|strong="H7200"\w* \w me|strong="H7200"\w*, because \w I|strong="H7760"\w* am \w swarthy|strong="H7840"\w*, because \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w sun|strong="H8121"\w* \w hath|strong="H1121"\w* \w scorched|strong="H2787"\w* \w me|strong="H7200"\w*. \w My|strong="H7760"\w* mother’s \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w were|strong="H1121"\w* incensed \w against|strong="H7760"\w* \w me|strong="H7200"\w*, \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w made|strong="H7760"\w* \w me|strong="H7200"\w* \w keeper|strong="H5201"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w vineyards|strong="H3754"\w*; \add but \add*\w mine|strong="H7760"\w* own \w vineyard|strong="H3754"\w* \w have|strong="H1121"\w* \w I|strong="H7760"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w kept|strong="H5201"\w*.

\w Tell|strong="H5046"\w* \w me|strong="H5315"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w thou|strong="H1961"\w* whom \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* loveth, \w where|strong="H4100"\w* \w thou|strong="H1961"\w* \w feedest|strong="H7462"\w* \add thy flock\add*, \w where|strong="H4100"\w* \w thou|strong="H1961"\w* makest \add it \add*\w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w rest|strong="H7257"\w* \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w noon|strong="H6672"\w*: \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w why|strong="H4100"\w* \w should|strong="H4100"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w one|strong="H1961"\w* \w that|strong="H5315"\w* \w is|strong="H4100"\w* veiled \w beside|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w flocks|strong="H5739"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w thy|strong="H5046"\w* \w companions|strong="H2270"\w*?

If \w thou|strong="H3045"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w thou|strong="H3045"\w* \w fairest|strong="H3303"\w* \w among|strong="H5921"\w* women, \w go|strong="H3318"\w* \w thy|strong="H3045"\w* \w way|strong="H5921"\w* \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w footsteps|strong="H6119"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w flock|strong="H6629"\w*, \w and|strong="H6629"\w* \w feed|strong="H7462"\w* \w thy|strong="H3045"\w* \w kids|strong="H1429"\w* \w beside|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w shepherds|strong="H7462"\w*’ \w tents|strong="H4908"\w*.

\w I|strong="H7393"\w* have \w compared|strong="H1819"\w* thee, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* my \w love|strong="H7474"\w*, \w to|strong="H1819"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* steed \w in|strong="H7393"\w* \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w*’s \w chariots|strong="H7393"\w*.

Thy \w cheeks|strong="H3895"\w* \w are|strong="H3895"\w* \w comely|strong="H4998"\w* \w with|strong="H6677"\w* plaits \add of hair\add*, thy \w neck|strong="H6677"\w* \w with|strong="H6677"\w* \w strings|strong="H2737"\w* \w of|strong="H6677"\w* jewels

\w We|strong="H6213"\w* \w will|strong="H6213"\w* \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w thee|strong="H6213"\w* plaits \w of|strong="H6213"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w studs|strong="H5351"\w* \w of|strong="H6213"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*.

\w While|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* sat \w at|strong="H4428"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w table|strong="H4524"\w*, \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w spikenard|strong="H5373"\w* \w sent|strong="H5414"\w* \w forth|strong="H5414"\w* \w its|strong="H5414"\w* \w fragrance|strong="H7381"\w*.

My \w beloved|strong="H1730"\w* \w is|strong="H1730"\w* unto me \add as \add*\w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w bundle|strong="H6872"\w* \w of|strong="H6872"\w* \w myrrh|strong="H4753"\w*, \w that|strong="H3885"\w* lieth betwixt my \w breasts|strong="H7699"\w*.

My \w beloved|strong="H1730"\w* \w is|strong="H1730"\w* \w unto|strong="H3754"\w* me \add as \add*\w a|strong="H3068"\w* cluster \w of|strong="H3754"\w* henna-flowers in the \w vineyards|strong="H3754"\w* \w of|strong="H3754"\w* \w En-gedi|strong="H5872"\w*.

\w Behold|strong="H2005"\w*, thou art \w fair|strong="H3303"\w*, my \w love|strong="H7474"\w*; \w behold|strong="H2005"\w*, thou art \w fair|strong="H3303"\w*; thine \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w are|strong="H5869"\w* \add as \add*\w doves|strong="H3123"\w*.

\w Behold|strong="H2005"\w*, thou art \w fair|strong="H3303"\w*, my \w beloved|strong="H1730"\w*, yea, \w pleasant|strong="H5273"\w*: also our \w couch|strong="H6210"\w* \w is|strong="H1730"\w* \w green|strong="H7488"\w*.

\w The|strong="H1004"\w* \w beams|strong="H6982"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* our \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w are|strong="H1004"\w* cedars, \add and \add*our \w rafters|strong="H7351"\w* \w are|strong="H1004"\w* firs.
